sts heel flap turn work so ws is facing row 1 ws slip 1 pwise p31 row 2 rs *slip 1 pwise with yarn in back k1 repeat from * to end of row repeat row 1 & 2 for a total of 16 times set-up for heel turn work row 1 one more time heel turn row 1 rs slip 1 pwise k17 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws slip 1 pwise p5 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 rs slip 1 pwise knit to 1 stitch before gap ssk one stitch from each side of gap k1 turn work row 4 ws slip 1 pwise purl to 1 stitch before gap p2tog one stitch from each side of gap p1 turn work repeat row 3 & 4 until all heel sts have been worked ending with an ssk on the last rs row and a p2tog on ws row there will remain 18 sts gusset set-up for gusset transfer all the instep sts back onto one dpn by slipping 16 sts pwise now you have 18 sts on the heel dpn
